com.thomasdiewald.pixelflow.java.imageprocessing.filter

Class MinMaxGlobal

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thomasdiewald.pixelflow.java.imageprocessing.filter.MinMaxGlobal

  • public class MinMaxGlobal
extends java.lang.Object
    Parallel reduction Min/Max filter. Step size can be 2, 3 or 4, where 4 turns out to be a little bit faster.
    Author:
    Thomas

      • getVal

        public DwGLTexture getVal()
        Returns:
        A two-pixel texture, where pixel(0,0) has the min-value and pixel(1,0) the max-value.
